theme.name: Space Frontier
theme.prompt: space station orbiting alien worlds, advanced technology, cosmic mysteries, and alien encounters

currentScene.narrationText: You step into the research lab, a hub of scientific exploration and discovery. Equipment hums quietly.
currentScene.imageDescription: The research lab is a bustling center of technology and innovation. Sleek workstations are filled with advanced scientific equipment: microscopes with holographic displays, glass vials containing colorful liquids, and intricate mechanical devices. Soft white lights illuminate the room, reflecting off the brushed metal surfaces. Large digital screens display complex data, while robotic arms delicately handle sensitive materials. The lab exudes an atmosphere of intellectual pursuit and cutting-edge research.
currentScene.musicDescription: A light, rhythmic electronic beat underscores the sense of innovation. Melodic synths weave through, creating an atmosphere of curiosity and intellect.

exits.description: A secure door leads to the specimen room

conversationHistory.content: You stand at the docking bay of a vast space station orbiting an alien world. The hum of machinery surrounds you as cosmic mysteries await.
You enter the main corridor of the space station. The pathway stretches into the distance, with doors lining the walls.
The corridor stretches on, its quiet hum a constant companion. You pause, taking a moment to gather your thoughts.
You count your steps as you wander the corridor, each footfall echoing softly in the quiet space.
You step into the research lab, a hub of scientific exploration and discovery. Equipment hums quietly.
